languages.text: Спустя несколько корабельных вахт опасения ксеносов подтвержаются. Присутствие чужаков, заполонивших нижние палубы, воспринялось простым людом как нашествие богомерзких мутантов. Вознеся молитвы Императору, они поспешили разгерметизировать отсек с ксеносами вместе с теми, кого "успела коснуться скверна нечистых".

After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."
languages.original_text: Спустя несколько корабельных вахт опасения ксеносов подтвержаются. Присутствие чужаков, заполонивших нижние палубы, воспринялось простым людом как нашествие богомерзких мутантов. Вознеся молитвы Императору, они поспешили разгерметизировать отсек с ксеносами вместе с теми, кого "успела коснуться скверна нечистых".

traits.locale_text: After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurize the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurize the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

languages.text: 几巡之后，关于异形的疑虑得到了证实。那些出现在底层甲板上的异形，被普通人误认为邪恶的变种人入侵甲板。他们一边向帝皇祈祷，一边匆匆忙忙地赶往气闸，对这些“被不洁玷污之人”所处的舱室进行减压。
languages.original_text: After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

traits.locale_text: 几巡之后，关于异形的疑虑得到了证实。那些出现在底层甲板上的异形，被普通人误认为邪恶的变种人入侵甲板。他们一边向帝皇祈祷，一边匆匆忙忙地赶往气闸，对这些“被不洁玷污之人”所处的舱室进行减压。

languages.text: 数回の監視の後、異種族の疑惑は的中する。下甲板を埋め尽くす部外者の存在は、一般の者たちには神をも恐れぬ変異体の侵略と受け止められた。皇帝への祈りを叫びながら、彼らは 「不浄の汚れに触れた」者たちとともに異種族のいる区画を減圧しようと急いだ。
languages.original_text: After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

traits.locale_text: 数回の監視の後、異種族の疑惑は的中する。下甲板を埋め尽くす部外者の存在は、一般の者たちには神をも恐れぬ変異体の侵略と受け止められた。皇帝への祈りを叫びながら、彼らは 「不浄の汚れに触れた」者たちとともに異種族のいる区画を減圧しようと急いだ。

languages.text: Tras unas cuantas guardias, las sospechas de los xenos quedan confirmadas. La presencia de forasteros que llenaban las cubiertas inferiores fue percibida por la gente corriente como una invasión de mutantes impíos. Rezando al Emperador, se apresuraron a despresurizar el compartimento que contenía a los xenos junto a los que habían sido «tocados por la inmundicia de los impuros».
languages.original_text: After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

traits.locale_text: Tras unas cuantas guardias, las sospechas de los xenos quedan confirmadas. La presencia de forasteros que llenaban las cubiertas inferiores fue percibida por la gente corriente como una invasión de mutantes impíos. Rezando al Emperador, se apresuraron a despresurizar el compartimento que contenía a los xenos junto a los que habían sido «tocados por la inmundicia de los impuros».

languages.text: Nach einigen Wachschichten wird der Verdacht der Xenos bestätigt. Die Anwesenheit von Fremden auf den Unterdecks wurde vom Pöbel als Invasion gottloser Mutanten angesehen. Gebete zum Imperator schreiend lösten sie in dem Modul mit den Xenos darin einen plötzlichen Druckabfall aus und töteten auch alle, "die vom Schmutz der Unreinen berührt worden waren".
languages.original_text: After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

traits.locale_text: Nach einigen Wachschichten wird der Verdacht der Xenos bestätigt. Die Anwesenheit von Fremden auf den Unterdecks wurde vom Pöbel als Invasion gottloser Mutanten angesehen. Gebete zum Imperator schreiend lösten sie in dem Modul mit den Xenos darin einen plötzlichen Druckabfall aus und töteten auch alle, "die vom Schmutz der Unreinen berührt worden waren".

languages.text: Au bout de quelques quarts, les craintes des xénos se voient confirmées. La présence de ces étrangers qui ont investi les ponts inférieurs a été perçue par le commun des hommes comme une invasion de mutants hérétiques. Hurlant à tue-tête des prières à l'Empereur, ils se hâtent de dépressuriser le compartiment abritant les xénos ainsi que tous ceux qui ont été « contaminés par la souillure des impurs ».
languages.original_text: After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."

traits.locale_text: Au bout de quelques quarts, les craintes des xénos se voient confirmées. La présence de ces étrangers qui ont investi les ponts inférieurs a été perçue par le commun des hommes comme une invasion de mutants hérétiques. Hurlant à tue-tête des prières à l'Empereur, ils se hâtent de dépressuriser le compartiment abritant les xénos ainsi que tous ceux qui ont été « contaminés par la souillure des impurs ».

languages.text: Birkaç vardiya sonra zenoların şüpheleri doğrulanıyor. Alt güverteleri dolduran yabancıların varlığı, sıradan insanlar tarafından tanrısız mutantların istilası olarak algılanıyor. İmparator'a dualarını ederek zenoların ve "günahkârların ahlaksızlığına aldananların" bulunduğu bölmenin basıncını boşaltmak için harekete geçiyorlar.
languages.original_text: After a few watches, the xenos' suspicions are validated. The presence of outsiders who filled the lower decks was perceived by ordinary people as an invasion of godless mutants. Shouting prayers to the Emperor, they rushed to depressurise the compartment containing the xenos alongside those who were "touched by the filth of the unclean."
